# BICEP2/Keck Array and Planck Joint Analysis January 2015 Data Products
# The BICEP2/Keck and Planck Collaborations, A Joint Analysis of BICEP2/Keck Array and Planck Data
# http://bicepkeck.org/
#
# File: bandpass_P100.txt 
# Date: 2015-02-23
#
# Experiment bandpasses for the multi-component likelihood described in Section III of A Joint Analysis of BICEP2/Keck Array and Planck Data.
# See the comments in the .dataset file for further information.
# This file provides the frequency spectrum for: P100.
#   Column 1 = frequency in GHz
#   Column 2 = response to a source with uniform spectral radiance
# See Planck 2013 results IX and BK-II for further details.
